collectible.text: Start off your Mettaton-flavoured experience with this exclusive coupon. Enjoy 50% discount on your first payment of the official Mettaton fanclub membership! Just present this coupon to the cashier. You'll recognize him, he's the awkward-looking guy on the counter. Terms and conditions apply.
